item.title: Python Blog
item.description: Python and R Studio are both really interesting and useful tools used to interpret data, make graphics, and create websites. One really cool feature shared between these two languages is their ability to be utilized simultaneously in one document. My goal for this blog is to demonstrate the use of both languages to render specific results of interest. library(reticulate) hello<-"I hope that you find" there= "this blog post interesting." print(r.
